CustomField.description: Quantity for products that have a specific person assigned to a product. This field will pass to Salesforce as employees-X:contractors-X:international_contractors-X:international_employees-X where X is the number assigned for the person type. Salesforce will parse this into the Quantity field on Opportunity Product Lines for each product set up for the add on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Quantity for products that have a specific person assigned to a product. This field will pass to Salesforce as employees-X:contractors-X:international_contractors-X:international_employees-X where X is the number assigned for the person type. Salesforce will parse this into the Quantity field on Opportunity Product Lines for each product set up for the add on.
CustomField.label: Assigned Quantity
